mapper.select: select file_id, file_name, file_size, file_ext, file_user_id, file_uuid, file_path, file_state, file_class_id, file_create_time,file_brief from file_info where file_state = #{fileState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select file_id, file_name, file_size, file_ext, file_user_id, file_uuid, file_path, file_state, file_class_id, file_create_time,file_brief from file_info where file_user_id = #{userId} and file_id like #{searchInfo} or file_user_id = #{userId} and file_name like #{searchInfo} or file_state = 5 and file_id like #{searchInfo} or file_state = 5 and file_name like #{searchInfo} order by file_id desc

select file_id, file_name, file_size, file_ext, file_user_id, file_uuid, file_path, file_state, file_class_id, file_create_time,file_brief,user_name,classification_name from file_info f left join user_info u on f.file_user_id = u.user_id left join classification c on f.file_class_id = c.classification_id where f.file_name like #{searchValue}

SELECT f.file_id, COUNT(c.file_id) as ct,file_name, file_size, file_ext, file_user_id, file_uuid, file_path,file_brief, file_state, file_class_id FROM click_info c LEFT JOIN file_info f on f.file_id = c.file_id where f.file_state = 5 GROUP BY f.file_id order BY ct desc LIMIT 0,7

select f.file_id, file_name, file_size, file_ext, file_user_id, file_uuid, file_path, file_state, file_class_id, file_create_time,file_brief,user_name,click_time from file_info f left join user_info u on f.file_user_id = u.user_id left join click_info c on f.file_id = c.file_id where f.file_state = 5 order by file_create_time desc limit 0,7

select f.file_id, f.file_name, f.file_size, f.file_ext, f.file_user_id, f.file_uuid, f.file_path, f.file_state, f.file_class_id, c.click_time 'fileCreateTime',f.file_brief from file_info f left join click_info c on f.file_id = c.file_id where c.user_id = #{userId} order by c.click_id desc limit 0,7

select file_id, file_name, file_size, file_ext, file_user_id, file_uuid, file_path, file_state, file_class_id, file_create_time,file_brief,user_name,classification_name from file_info f left join user_info u on f.file_user_id = u.user_id left join classification c on f.file_class_id = c.classification_id where f.file_name like #{searchValue} and f.file_user_id = #{userId}

select file_id, file_name, file_size, file_ext, file_user_id, file_uuid, file_path, file_state, file_class_id, file_create_time,file_brief,user_name,classification_name,md5 from file_info f left join user_info u on f.file_user_id = u.user_id left join classification c on f.file_class_id = c.classification_id where f.file_uuid = #{fileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1
mapper.insert: insert into file_info (file_name, file_size, file_ext, file_user_id, file_uuid, file_path, file_state, file_class_id, file_create_time, file_brief,md5) values (#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileExt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileClassId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileBrief,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update file_info set file_ext=#{fileExt} where file_id=#{fileId}

update file_info
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT},
file_ext = #{fileExt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_user_id = #{fileUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
file_uuid = #{fileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_state = #{fileState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_class_id = #{fileClassId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
file_create_time = #{fileCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where file_uuid = #{fileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
